VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: vanometric reactor
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: Overhauls the androids reactor to increase its power output without decreasing its lifespan. The mechanics of how this overhaul works aren't entirely known.

VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: expanded reactor
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: By cramming an oversized reactor into the androids chassis, you can increase it's power lifespan. This does not however increase its efficiency

VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: welding mechanites
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this archite subroutine have mechanites capable of welding materials together flowing in their neutroamine. This lets them slowly heal wounds passively

VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: lucifer's bargain
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: By infusing the androids neutropump filters with luciferium mechanites, you can dramatically increase the androids productivity, all without risking the side effects of normal luciferium.

VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: personal persona processor
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have an AI persona core wired into their artificial brain, greatly expanding their data processing.

VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: archite optical processors
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have greatly expanded visual capabilities

VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: archite manipulation sensors
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have greatly enhanced manipulatory sensors and motors, which grants them enhanced manipulation.

VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.label: archite movement servos
VAGUEArchite.ArchiteAndroidGeneDef.description: Androids with this subroutine have bolstered movement servos, granting them increased movement
